Contao Panorama Element
=======================

[![](https://img.shields.io/badge/Contao%204-compatible-orange.svg?style=flat-square&logo=data%3Aimage%2Fsvg%2Bxml%3Bbase64%%%3D%3D)](https://contao.org/) [![](https://img.shields.io/packagist/v/numero2/contao-panorama-ce.svg?style=flat-square)](https://packagist.org/packages/numero2/contao-panorama-ce) [![](https://img.shields.io/badge/License-LGPL%20v3-blue.svg?style=flat-square)](http://www.gnu.org/licenses/lgpl-3.0)

About
--
Adds a content element to display panoramic / VR / 360Â° images using [Pannellum](https://github.com/mpetroff/pannellum).

System requirements
--

* [Contao](https://github.com/contao/contao) 4.13 or newer


Installation & Configuration
--

**Contao 4 & 5**
* Use the Contao Manager or Composer (`composer require numero2/contao-panorama-ce`)
* Run a database update via the Installtool or via the database migrations in Contao Manager
